skill.name: adaptyv
skill.description: Cloud laboratory platform for automated protein testing and validation. Use when designing proteins and needing experimental validation including binding assays, expression testing, thermostability measurements, enzyme activity assays, or protein sequence optimization. Also use for submitting experiments via API, tracking experiment status, downloading results, optimizing protein sequences for better expression using computational tools (NetSolP, SoluProt, SolubleMPNN, ESM), or managing protein design workflows with wet-lab validation.
skill.summary: Cloud laboratory platform for automated protein testing and validation. Use when designing proteins ...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill content contains documentation and sample code for calling a documented Adaptyv API endpoint. No credential harvesting, exfiltration logic, persistence, or obfuscation patterns were found.

content.value_statement: You need reliable protein validation without running a wet lab. This skill guides API submissions, tracking, and result handling for Adaptyv assays.
actual_capabilities: Submit protein sequences for binding, expression, thermostability, or enzyme activity assays
Check experiment status, list experiments, and poll for completion
Download results and surface raw data download links
Search target catalog and request custom targets
Use optimization guidance with NetSolP, SoluProt, SolubleMPNN, and ESM
limitations: Requires Adaptyv API access and a valid API key
Typical turnaround time is about 21 days for experiments
Some features are alpha or beta and may change
Computational tools require separate installation and setup

use_cases.title: Validate binding variants
use_cases.description: Submit antibody variants for binding assays and track affinity results across design rounds.

use_cases.title: Plan expression screening
use_cases.description: Batch submit sequences for expression testing and compare yields for manufacturability.

use_cases.title: Optimize then test
use_cases.description: Filter sequences with solubility predictors, then submit top candidates for wet lab validation.

prompt_templates.title: Get started
prompt_templates.scenario: New user wants a minimal API flow
prompt_templates.prompt: Show a minimal example to submit one protein sequence for expression testing and check the experiment status.

prompt_templates.title: Batch submission
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a batch submission example with metadata for 10 variants and explain the response fields.

prompt_templates.title: Results workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to download results and summarize binding metrics for each sequence.

prompt_templates.title: Optimization pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline a pipeline that filters sequences with solubility tools, selects top candidates, and submits them to Adaptyv.

output_examples.input: Summarize the steps to submit a binding assay and track completion.
output: Prepare FASTA sequences and choose the binding experiment type
Send a POST request to the experiments endpoint with your API key
Store the experiment ID from the response
Check status using the experiment ID or set a webhook for completion
Download results when the status is completed

best_practices: Use webhooks for long running experiments instead of frequent polling
Batch related sequences to reduce overhead and improve comparison
Validate FASTA formatting and include controls before submission
anti_patterns: Submitting sequences without API access or valid credits
Polling every minute for multi day experiments
Skipping computational pre screening for large libraries

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude and Codex?
faq.answer: Yes. The guidance is platform neutral and works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: Experiments require Adaptyv access, credits, and a typical turnaround of about 21 days.

faq.question: Can I integrate with my pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes. The API endpoints support programmatic submissions, status checks, and result downloads.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill does not collect or transmit data beyond the documented API calls you choose to run.

faq.question: What if my request fails?
faq.answer: Check the error code, validate sequences, and retry with backoff or contact support with the experiment ID.

faq.question: How does this compare to local assays?
faq.answer: It replaces lab setup with a managed service but has longer turnaround and requires external credits.
